group_1.narration: The final moments of these Magical Girls,@and the hope they entrusted to me.
The memories of those involved are inscribed here,@along with their thoughts and emotions.
That's why I think this inherited hope deserves@more than what someone like me can provide.
Rena, Momoko, Kaede…@You mustn't let her hope dim.

group_1.textCenter: It's hard to protect your land, even if you@understand the heart of the people…
I've done my best, but I wonder if it's enough@to earn Mama's praise.
If I could go back in time, I'd want to lay@my head in her lap again.
I'm here today thanks to Rena and her friends.
My fond memories of those days with Mama@and Slurpy...
They sparkled like the morning sun, and I smile@every time they cross my mind.
I'm sure that I can keep moving forward@because of those memories.
That's why I'm entrusting this hope that@came true to the future.
So that someday, in that future country where@Momoko, Kaede, and Rena went...
My hopes might be of some help to them.
